portfolio.title: The Post-it Game
portfolio.short: A simple remote party game for when you can't meet in person.
portfolio.long: Also known as "Heads Up" or "The Name Game", this simple remote party game allows you to give each other a name which they then have to guess using basic yes/no questions posed to the rest of the group.
